name: Fluidizer parts
description: A Fluidizer is built using the following parts.$(br2)All parts are mandatory, with the exception of Glass, which can be used in place of a Casing block in the four vertical faces of the machine, and the Injectors.$(br2)The type and number of Injectors in the machine will define its $(l:bigreactors:fluidizer/operational_mode)operational mode$(/l).
